docs.abstract: Decline in number of overall Olympic medals won by Chinese athletes at 2016 Rio Games in comparison to other Olympics is seen by some as blemish on national pride; others question whether sacrifice demanded of athletes and taxpayers is worth it, given country's other challenges.

headline.main: Lower Medal Count in Rio Rattles China’s Olympics Obsession
